title: Retirement Advisor: Marcia Mantell On What Women Need To Know About Social Security
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Retirement consultant Marcia Mantell is the author of the new book, “What’s the deal with Social Security for Women?” In this podcast (18:57), Mantell reviews some key Social Security claiming issues pertinent to widows, divorcees, married and single women. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
